citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
**The following outdated medications or medical supplies were identified during the inspection:
a. Holm Center- Fatal Plus, lot #2889, exp 08/2023, Bottle #115, 116, 117, 118, 119, 120, 121
b. Hemoparasite Barn: 1 bottle Penicillin, lot #1033-51A, exp 01/2023; 4 bottles Prestige 5-way
vaccine, lot # 9185A0308, exp 6/2023
**The use of outdated medications and/or medical supplies may not be safe or efficacious. It is the responsibility of the
facility to ensure appropriate methods are used to prevent, control, diagnose and treat diseases in order to ensure the
health and well-being of the animals housed at the facility.
Correct by: 09/15/2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
